name: Bubble Biologist
description: Join Dr. Penelope Hog as she takes on a special mission in the Atlantic Ocean! Tasked with searching for the threatened blobfish, you'll help her explore, study local marine life, and find as many fish as possible in this classic platformer.

name: Scaly Scaling
description: Chameleon Chaos! Help Carey Casey the Chameleon obtain delicious golden beetles in this weird puzzle/platformer hybrid.

name: Rat Out
description: Take the mouse to justice! Discover evidence by scrolling though 'Squeaker' and looking for suspicious activity.

name: Weometry Gars
description: Weometry Gars is a top down shooter where you, the player, take turns with the enemies firing and dodging shots.

name: Carruto
description: Grow your own clones to solve 1 of 4 unique puzzles. But be careful, for your clones follow your every move... in reverse!
